resources.string: Silent Breaker breaks the silent mode after a specific number of calls from a caller.The silent mode remains disabled for that number only!
""Number of calls:"" The minimum number of calls that a caller needs to make to break silent mode of this phone.
""Time interval:""The caller has to exceed the specified number of calls within this time to make your phone ring.The input should be in minutes unit.
""Special number:""Silent mode will always be disabled for this number.
This is the first time running the app.\n Do you want to read the manual first?
